text: The 2016 Junior League World Series took place from August 14–21 in Taylor, Michigan, United States. Taoyuan, Taiwan defeated Kapaa, Hawaii in the championship game. It was Taiwan's the fourth straight championship. Due to the addition of the Australia region; a modified–double–elimination format was introduced. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#bebebe" ! United States !
